summary: Told in four vignettes, this existential comedy relates the exploits of four aspiring criminals who hope to improve their lot, but find that they might not have what it takes for a life of crime.
cast: Anna Mouglalis|Edouard Baer|Jean Rochefort|Laurent Terzieff|Jean-Pierre Kalfon|Venantino Venantini|Roger Dumas|Alain Bashung|Arno|Bouli Lanners|Serge Larivière|Selma El Mouissi|Gérald Laroche|Gábor Rassov|Samuel Benchetrit
title: J'ai toujours rêvé d'être un gangster
